member.summary:
(3.13A) Enhance motor control, Master and 0..3 slave. Motor in enhance mode.
Generates before the start of the motor(s) also a reset for the addressed Counter(s).
member.param: number of pulses before stop, 1 rotation =xx pulses.
0..3 index slave motor 1 or: Motor::NoMotor = not in use
0..3 index slave motor 2 or: Motor::NoMotor = not in use
0..3 index slave motor 3 or: Motor::NoMotor = not in use

number of pulses before stop, 1 rotation =xx pulses.

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.api.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandlerEx2.DoTransferCompressed
member.summary:
Do an I/O transfer with compressed data transmission. This mode is always faster and more reliable than the simple mode. Note: transfers are automatically timed by the interface to once per 10ms The interface sends the response 10 to +/- 30ms after it send the previous response.
Only in this mode are the callbacks optional active.

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.api.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandlerEx2.DoTransferSimple
member.summary: Do a transfer (uncompressed MASTER ONLY mode This function is mostly to illustrate the use of the simple uncompressed transfer mode e.g. for use in other languages. It is recommended to use the compressed transfer mode. Note: transfers are automatically timed by the interface to once per 10ms The interface sends the response 10ms after it send the previous response

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandlerEx1.StopI2C
member.summary: Stop the I2C communication However the communication protocol itself is not available

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandlerEx1.StartI2C
member.summary: Start the I2C communication However the communication protocol itself is not available

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandler.PrintIR(ShmIfId_TXT)
member.summary: Print the IR info to the console

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandler.PrintIO(ShmIfId_TXT)
member.summary: Print the most important inputs and outputs to the console

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandler.DoTransfer
member.summary:
Do an I/O transfer.
For the mode
Compressed mode is always faster and more reliable than the simple mode. Note: transfers are automatically timed by the interface to once per 10ms The interface sends the response 10ms after it send the previous response

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandler.SetTransferMode(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Set the transfer mode
Default is Compressed.
member.param:
Simple mode =false: no compression only for master
Compression mode = true: works for both only master and master+ slave.
member.remarks:
since 2020-06-18
MicLog and MicLin do not work in the Simple mode

member.name: M:fischertechnik.txt.remote.ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandler.Dispose
member.summary: Destructor
Constructor
member.param: pointer to transfer area to which this transfer handler shall transfer data. The user must ensure, that this persists as long as the ftIF2013TransferAreaComHandler object is active.
number of areas (=master+extensions) to handle, max=IF_TXT_MAX (1 or 2)
TCP/IP address or host name usually 192.168.7.2 USB, 192.168.8.2 for WLAN and 192.168.9.2 for Bluetooth
directory where the library stores his log file
